name: Processing
body:
<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd">
<html>

<head>
    <title>Processing Template</title>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/0.4.13/addons/p5.dom.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/0.4.13/p5.js"></script>
    <script>
        // sun's x and y values
        var sunX = 50;
        var sunY = 600;
        
        //declares change
        var change = 1;
        
        //declares clouds
        var clouds;
        
        //declares x and y values
        var centerX = 100;
        var centerY = 100;
        
        //declares scale
        var scale;

        function setup() {
            createCanvas(800, 600);
            height = centerY;
            
            //makes cloud color radndom collor bettween white and black
            clouds = random(0, 255);
            
            scale = 80;


        }

        function draw() {
            background(65, 205, 233)//blue background
            noStroke();
            fill(0, 180, 0);
            rect(centerX - 100, centerY + 400, 800, 100);//grass
            fill(clouds);
            noStroke()
            
            //1st cloud
            ellipse(centerX, centerY, 90, 50);
            ellipse(centerX + 30, centerY, 90, 60);
            ellipse(centerX + 60, centerY, 90, 50);
            
            //2nd cloud
            ellipse(centerX + 280, centerY, 90, 50);
            ellipse(centerX + 310, centerY, 90, 60);
            ellipse(centerX + 340, centerY, 90, 50);
            
            //3rd cloud
            ellipse(centerX + 540, centerY, 90, 50);
            ellipse(centerX + 570, centerY, 90, 60);
            ellipse(centerX + 600, centerY, 90, 50);
            
            //sun
            fill(255, 255, 51);//sun color
            noStroke()
            ellipse(sunX, sunY, scale, scale)//location of the sun
            sunX += 3;//movement by X
            sunY -= 10;//movement by Y

            //makes the proabla seen by sun
            sunY += change;
            change += 0.07;


        }
    </script>
</head>

<body>

</body>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
